DoRTL.description: bool ; Do Local Tangent RTL (def=true). Transform the coordinate in RTL

RTL.description: string ; Name of the file which define the RTL

DefZ.description: real ; Will allow to specify the altitude value, not implemanted for now

SysCo.description: string; System of coordinates, by default RTL created (RTLFromExif.xml). Allow to change the coordinate system.

Timeout.description: integer; expressed in seconds. Avoid to wait undefined time after XifGps2Txt  command execution
